anya-e1201n:5_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti,
anya-e1201n:5_1: a ā i ī u ū e ऐ o औ ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ;
anya-e1201n:5_3: titālīsāti vacanaṃ katthavi vaṇṇalopaṃ ñāpeti; tena-
anya-e1201n:7_0: Tatthādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti; tena kvattho “saro lopo sare“. ccādi.
anya-e1201n:9_0: Tesu dvedve sarā savaṇṇā nāma honti; tena kvattho “vaṇṇapareṇa savaṇṇopi“
anya-e1201n:12_0: Tesu dvīsu yo yo pubbo so so rassasañño hoti;
anya-e1201n:12_1: tesu e o saṃyogato pubbāva dissanti;
anya-e1201n:14_0: Tesveva dvīsu yo yo paro so so dīghasañño hoti; tena kvattho’yolopanisu dīgho“.ccādi.
anya-e1201n:16_0: Kakārādayo vaṇṇā niggahītapariyantā byajanasaññā honti; tena kvattho “byajane dīgharassā“.ccādi.
anya-e1201n:18_0: Kādayo pañcakā pañca vaggā nāma hontī; tena kvattho “vagge vagganto“. ccādi.
anya-e1201n:20_0: Yvāyaṃ vaṇṇe bindumatto so niggahītasañño hoti;
anya-e1201n:22_0: Nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ tassa ante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:24_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamānā ivaṇṇu vaṇṇā pasaññā honti;
anya-e1201n:26_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassante vattamāno ākāro ghasañeññā hoti;
anya-e1201n:28_0: Ālapane si gasañño hoti; tena kvattho “ge ve“.Ccādi.
anya-e1201n:31_0: Yaṃ visesanaṃ tadantassa vidhi ñātabbo; “ato yonaṃ ṭāṭe“. Narā nare.
anya-e1201n:33_3: saretopasilesikādhāro tatthetāva vuccate pubbasseva hoti na parassāti.
anya-e1201n:35_5: osadhyo anantare katatthatāya na vyava hitassa kāriyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:37_0: Parassa sissamānaṃ kāriyamādivaṇṇassa ñātabbaṃ; “ra saṅkhyāto vā“. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:39_0: Chaṭṭhiniddiṭṭhassa yaṃ kāriyaṃ tadantassa vaṇṇassa viññeyyaṃ “rājassi nāmhi“. Rājinā.
anya-e1201n:43_0: Ṭakāro’nubandho yassa so’nekakkharo cādeso sabbassa hoti;
anya-e1201n:47_0: Makāro’nubandho yassa so sarānamantā sarā paro hotī; “mañca rudhādīnaṃ“. Rundhati.
anya-e1201n:49_0: Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānaṃ sahappattiyaṃ paro;
anya-e1201n:49_3: so ca gacchati tvañca gacchasi ahañca gacchāmi,
anya-e1201n:53_0: Vaṇṇasaddo paro yasmā tena savaṇṇo’pi gayhati saṃva rūpaṃ; yuvaṇṇānamño luttā“. Vāteritaṃ, samonā.
anya-e1201n:59_0: Paro kvaci lopanīyo hoti; so’pi, sāva,
anya-e1201n:61_0: Pubbaparasarā dve’pi vā kvaci na lupyante; latā iva lateva latāva.
anya-e1201n:63_0: Luttā sarā paresaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ño honti vā yathākkamaṃ; tassedaṃ,
anya-e1201n:65_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārā hontiva yathākkamaṃ; vyākato, iccassa,
anya-e1201n:67_0: Ñonaṃ yavā honti vā sare yathākkamaṃ; tyajja te’jja svāhaṃ so’haṃ,kvacitveva-puttāmatthi asantettha.
anya-e1201n:69_0: Sare gossa avaṅi hoti; gavāssaṃ; yathariva tatharivetinipātāva; bhusāmiveti ivasaddo evattho.
anya-e1201n:71_0: Rassadīghānaṃ kvaci dīgharassā honti byañjane; tatrāyaṃ, munīvare, sammadeva, mālahārī.
anya-e1201n:73_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpā honti; paggaho; saramhāti-kiṃ? Taṃkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:75_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresvesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsattya;
anya-e1201n:77_0: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā; ittheva icceva; eveti-kiṃ,iccāha.
anya-e1201n:79_0: Ñonaṃ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā;
anya-e1201n:81_6: sāmatthī yenāgamova sa ca rassasarasseva hoti tassa rassānugatattā.
anya-e1201n:85_0: Niggahītamhā parassa sarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci; tvaṃsi tvamasi.
anya-e1201n:87_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hoti paccā satyā;
anya-e1201n:89_0: Yaevahisaddesu niggahītassa vā ño hoti; yayaññadeva, taññeva, tañbhi; vātveva-yaṃyadeva.
anya-e1201n:91_0: Saṃsaddassa yaṃ niggahītaṃ tassa vā ño hoti yakāre; saññamo saṃyamo.
anya-e1201n:93_0: Niggahītassa mayadā honti vā sare kvaci; tamahaṃ, tayidaṃ, tadalaṃ; vātveva-taṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:95_0: Ete mayadā cāgamā honti sare vā kvaci;
anya-e1201n:97_0: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā; chaḷahaṃ, chaḷāyatanaṃ; vātveva-cha abhiññā.
anya-e1201n:103_0: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti; sakkate, paccate, aṭṭate, kuppate, phallate, assate,
anya-e1201n:107_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre; bavhābādho bahvā bādho.
anya-e1201n:109_1: aṭṭhakathā, gahaṇaṃ, paligho, palāyati, vātveca- dukkataṃ;
anya-e1201n:111_0: Saṃyogassa yo ādibhuto’vayavo tassa vā kvacī lopo hoti; pupphaṃsā, jāyate’gini.
anya-e1201n:113_0: Vīcchāyamābhikkhaññe ca yaṃ vattate tassa dve rūpāni honti,
anya-e1201n:113_1: kriyāya guṇena dabbena vā bhinne atthe vyāpitu micchā vīcchā;
anya-e1201n:114_3: yadi hi ettha mūlaggabhedo na siyā ānupubbiyampi na bhaveyya,
anya-e1201n:114_4: (jeṭṭhaṃ jeṭṭhamanuppavesaya) māsakaṃ māsakaṃ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṃ dvinnaṃ dehīti-
anya-e1201n:114_5: māsakaṃ māsakamiccetasmā vīcchāvagamyate saddantarato pana imamhā kahāpaṇāti avadhāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1201n:114_8: ime ubho aḍḍhā katarā katarā esaṃ dvinnamaḍḍhatā,
anya-e1201n:114_9: sabbe ime aḍḍhā katamā katamā imesaṃ aḍḍhatā,
anya-e1201n:116_0: Vīcchāmekassa dvitte pubbassa syādilopo hoti, ekekassa,
anya-e1201n:118_0: Sabbādīnaṃ vītihāre dve bhavanti pubbassa syādilopo ca; aññamaññassa bhojakā, itarītarassa bhojakā.
anya-e1201n:120_1: tasmiṃ sati vattu yāvanteha saddehi so’ttho viññāyate tāvanto saddā payujjante;
anya-e1201n:122_0: Ayamadhikāro āsatthaparisamattiyā tena nātippasaṅgo iṭṭhasiddhi ca.
anya-e1201n:125_0: Etesaṃ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā;
anya-e1201n:128_3: yanne vicchitaṃ nāpi anicchitaṃ tatthāpi dutīyā siddhā;
anya-e1201n:131_3: yadā tu dhātunā yutto pati tadā tenāyogā sambandhe chaṭṭhī ca tassa nappaṭi bhātīti?
anya-e1201n:133_1: tasmiṃ viññāyamāne kālasaddehi addha saddehi ca dutiyā hoti;
anya-e1201n:134_0: Phalappattiyaṃ kriyāparisamattyapavaggo tasmiṃ viññāya māne kāladdhānaṃ kriyāyāccantasaṃyoge tatiyābhimatā sāpi karaṇattāva siddhā;
anya-e1201n:135_0: Kārakamajjhe ye kāladdhānavācino tato sattamīpapañcamiyo abhimatā;
anya-e1201n:135_1: ajja bhutvā devadatto dvīhe bhuñjissati dvīhā bhuñjissati,
anya-e1201n:137_0: Gamanatthānaṃ bodhatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthānamakammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca payojje kattari dutiyā hoti,
anya-e1201n:137_1: sāmatthiyā ca payojakavyāpārena kammatāvassa hotīti patīyate;
anya-e1201n:137_8: ajjhāpayati māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ pāṭhayati māṇavakaṃ vedaṃ,
anya-e1201n:137_17: tamaparo payojayati tadā gamayati devadattaṃ yaññadatteneti -
anya-e1201n:139_0: Harādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā;
anya-e1201n:141_0: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti;
anya-e1201n:143_0: Vāhayati bhāraṃ devadattena; aniyantuketi-kiṃ?Vāhayati gāraṃ balivadde.
anya-e1201n:145_0: Bhakkhayati modake devadattena; ahiṃsāyanti kiṃ? Bhakkhayati balivadde sassaṃ.
anya-e1201n:151_0: Patiparīhi yuttamhā lakkhaṇādisu bhāge vatthe dutiyā hoti;
anya-e1201n:157_0: Hīnatthe’nunā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; anusāriputtaṃ paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:160_0: Hinatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā hoti; upasāriputta paññāvanto.
anya-e1201n:162_0: Ādhikyatthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti; upakhārayaṃ doṇo.
anya-e1201n:164_0: Sāmibhāvatthe’dhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti; adhibrahmadatte pañcālā, adhipañcālesu brahmadatto.
anya-e1201n:166_0: Kattari karaṇa cैa kārake tatiyā hoti;
anya-e1201n:170_3: tena hi aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate.
anya-e1201n:172_0: Takkiriyāyogge tatiyā siyā; annena vasati, vijjāya yaso.
anya-e1201n:174_0: Iṇe hetumhī pañcamī hoti vā;jaḷattā baddho satena vā.
anya-e1201n:178_0: Hetvatthavacīhi yege hetumhi chaṭhī siyayā; udarassa hetu, udarassa kāraṇā.
anya-e1201n:180_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbā vibhattiyo honti; ko hetu,
anya-e1201n:182_0: Yassa sammā padīyate tasmiṃ catutthi siyā;
anya-e1201n:184_0: Tassedaṃ tadatthaṃ tadatthabhāve jotanīye nāmasmā catutthī siyā;
anya-e1201n:185_5: na cevaṃ virodho siyā sadisarūpattā evaṃ vidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti-
anya-e1201n:187_10: yo mittānaṃ na dūhatī,[ ] yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati,
anya-e1201n:187_16: tena yācito ayācito vā tassa gāvo paṭisuṇāti,
anya-e1201n:187_27: arahati mallo mallassāti –jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññamanoti tādatthye catutthi;
anya-e1201n:188_0: “Yo ca sitaca uṇhaca tiṇā bhiyyo na namaññati“
anya-e1201n:189_4: yo hi saggaṃ gacchati tadatthaṃ tassa gamananti–-
anya-e1201n:189_8: ciraṃ jīvitaṃ bhaddaṃ kalyāṇaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ kusalaṃ anāmayaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ sukhaṃ sātaṃ bhoto hotu;
anya-e1201n:193_47: pāṭaliputtasmā rājagahaṃ satta yojanāni sattasu yojanesūti vā;
anya-e1201n:193_51: kacchena me adhi gatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā;
anya-e1201n:193_61: dūranti katthe hī tu sabbāva savisaye siyuṃ bādhakābhāvā;
anya-e1201n:193_64: keci panāhu asattavacanehetehi pāṭipadikatthe dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamiyo sattavacanehi tu sabbāva savisayeti;
anya-e1201n:195_0: Vajjane vattamānehi apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti;
anya-e1201n:197_0: Paṭinidhimhi paṭidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī vibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:199_0: Rite saddena yoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca rite saddhammaṃ, rite saddhammā.
anya-e1201n:201_0: Vināññatrasaddehi yoge nāmasmā tatiyā ca hoti,
anya-e1201n:203_0: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca; puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, jasanmā nānā.
anya-e1201n:205_0: Kriyādhārabhutakattukammānaṃ dhāraṇena yo kriyāyādhāro tasmiṃ kārake nāmasmā sattami hoti;
anya-e1201n:207_0: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti; ajinamhi haññate dīpi, musā vāde pācittiyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:209_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tato sattamī hoti;
anya-e1201n:211_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tato chaṭṭhī bhavati sattamī cānādare gamyāne.
anya-e1201n:214_5: gunnaṃ dāyādo gosu dāyādo gunnaṃ sakkhi gosu sakkhi,
anya-e1201n:216_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyatekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ yato taṃ karīyati tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti;
anya-e1201n:216_1: sāliyo sūkadhaññānaṃ pathyatamā sāliyo sūkadhaññesu pathya tamā,kaṇbhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā kaṇhā gāvīsu sampanna khīratamā,
anya-e1201n:216_2: gacchataṃ dhāvanto sīghatamā gacchantesu dhāvanto sīghatamā –-
anya-e1201n:220_0: Yato saddenābhimukhīkaraṇamāmantaṇaṃ tasmiṃ visaye paṭhamā vibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:221_0: Kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāma tasmiṃ chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti;
anya-e1201n:223_0: Divasassa tijhattuṃ, sakiṃ pakkhassa, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa kumbhiṃ tvevamādi.
anya-e1201n:224_9: kattukamma vacanicchāyantu tatiyādutiyāyova sañcatto pitarā ahaṃ,
anya-e1201n:226_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā;
anya-e1201n:228_0: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṃ ṭakārā sabbādesatthā; buddhā, buddhe, atoti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:230_0: Kārantato nāmasmā nīnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākka maṃ; rūpā, rūpe, rūpāni; atottheva-aṭṭhīni.
anya-e1201n:232_0: Akārantato nāmasmā smāsminnaṃ ṭāṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ; buddhā,
anya-e1201n:234_0: Akārantato parassa sassa catutthiyā āyo hoti vā; buddhāya,
anya-e1201n:234_2: bhiyyo tādatthyeyevāyamāyo dissate kvavi devaññattha; atotveva- isissa;
anya-e1201n:235_0: “Asmā lokā paramhā ca ubhayā dhaṃsate naro“tyāhaṃ mante paratthaddho;
anya-e1201n:237_0: Ghapato nādīnamekasmiṃ yayā honti yathākkamaṃ; kaññāya, rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā;
anya-e1201n:239_0: Ghapasaññehi tetimāmūhi nādīnamekasmiṃ ssā vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:239_6: evaṃ etissā, etāya, imissā, imāya, amussā, amuyā; etehīti- kiṃ? Sabbāya,
anya-e1201n:241_0: Dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṃkhyānaṃ nuka hoti namhi vibhattimhi; dvinnaṃ, catunnaṃ,
anya-e1201n:243_0: Namhi bahuno katissa ca sukaka hoti? Bahunnaṃ, katinnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:245_0: Jhasaññā tito naṃvacanassa ṇṇaṃṇṇannaṃ honti; tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, jhāti-kiṃ?Tissannaṃ.
anya-e1201n:249_0: Nāmasmā sassa suña hoti; buddhassa–-dvisakārapāṭhena siddhe lāghavatthamidaṃ.
anya-e1201n:251_1: itarissaṃ, itarissā, ekissaṃ, ekissā, aññassaṃ, aññassā, etissaṃ, etissāya, imissaṃ, imissā, imassāya; esviti- kiṃ? Itarāya, esanti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:253_0: Ssamādisu tassā vā i hoti; tissaṃ, tassaṃ, tissā, tassā, tissāya, tassāya;
anya-e1201n:255_0: Tāetāimāto sassassāyo hoti vā; tassāya, tāya, etissāya, etāya, imissāya, imāya.
anya-e1201n:257_0: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo hoti vā; ratto, rattiyaṃ, ādo, ādismiṃ.
anya-e1201n:261_2: pitu mātu bhātu dhītu duhitu jāmātu nattu hotu potu.
anya-e1201n:263_0: Latupitādīnaṃ a hoti ge ā ca; bho katta, bho kattā, bho pita, bho pitā.
anya-e1201n:265_0: A i u iccesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge;
anya-e1201n:265_2: bho purisa, bho aggī, bho aggi,
anya-e1201n:267_0: Ghato brahmādito ca gasse vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:269_0: Ammādīhi gassena hoti; bhoti ammā; bhoti annā, bhoti ambā.
anya-e1201n:271_0: Ammādīnaṃ ge rasso hoti vā; bhoti amma, bhoti ammā.
anya-e1201n:273_0: Ssamādisu gho rasso hoti; tassaṃ, tassā, tassāya, taṃ, sabhatiṃ –-esviti-kiṃ? Tāya, sahāya.
anya-e1201n:275_0: Ekavacane yosuva ghaokārantavajjitānaṃ nāmānaṃ rassohoti tiliṅge; itthiṃ, itthiyā, itthiyo, vadhuṃ, vadhuyā, vadhuyo; daddhiṃ, daddhinā, daddhino,
anya-e1201n:277_0: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge?Itthi, itthi, vadhu,
anya-e1201n:279_0: Napuṃsakavajjitassa nāmassa sismiṃ rasso na hoti. Itthi, daddhī, vadhū,
anya-e1201n:281_0: Gasihinaṃ cajjitāsu vibhattisu gosaddassa gāvagavā honti; gāvo, gavo, gāvena, gavena, gāvassa, gavassa, gāvasmā, gavasmā, gāve, gave;
anya-e1201n:281_2: Bho go go tiṭṭhati, gohi, gonaṃ.
anya-e1201n:283_0: Gossa sumhi gāvagavā honti vā; gāvesu, gavesu, gosu.
anya-e1201n:285_0: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena; gavaṃ, gāvassa, gavassa.
anya-e1201n:287_0: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavañca vā; gunnaṃ, gavaṃ, gonaṃ.
anya-e1201n:289_0: Goto nāssa ā hoti vā; gāvā, gavā, gāvena, gavena.
anya-e1201n:291_0: Aṃvacane gossa gāvu vā hoti; gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ–-gossa goṇādeso na kato saddantarattā.
anya-e1201n:293_0: Pasaññīto aṃvacanassa yaṃ vā hoti; itthiyaṃ, itthiṃ–-pitoti-kiṃ?Daddhiṃ, rattiṃ.
anya-e1201n:295_3: yogavibhāgā; jhāti- kiṃ? Itthiṃ, ītoti - kiṃ?Aggiṃ
anya-e1201n:297_0: Jhito yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge, daddhino, daddhine, daddhī–-
anya-e1201n:299_0: Jhito yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge; daddhino tiṭṭhanti, daddhino passa, daddhī vā.
anya-e1201n:301_0: Jhito smiṃvacanassa ni hoti vā; daddhinī, daddhismiṃ, jhito tveva-aggismiṃ.
anya-e1201n:303_1: phalaṃ patati ambuni,’padumaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ’, vātveva- ambumha, paṃsumhi.
anya-e1201n:305_0: Kammādito smino ni hoti vā; kammanī, kamme;
anya-e1201n:305_1: kamma camma vesma bhasma brahma atta ātuma ghamma muddha–-
anya-e1201n:307_0: Kammādito nāvavanassa eno vā hoti; kammena, kammanā, cammena, cammanā–-kammāditotveva-buddhena.
anya-e1201n:309_0: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti; aggino, aggissa,
anya-e1201n:315_0: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā palliṅge; bhikkhavo, bhikkhū, sayambhuvo, sayambhu–-pumeti-kiṃ?Āyūni.
anya-e1201n:317_0: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca vā pulliṅge; jantuno, jantavo, jantuyo,
anya-e1201n:319_0: Kuppaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge; viduno, vidū, viññuno, viñña, sabbaññuno, sabbañña.
anya-e1201n:321_0: Amusaddato yonaṃ lopova hoti pulliṅge; amū pumetveva-amuyo,amūni; vo’pavādā’yaṃ.
anya-e1201n:323_0: Amusmā sassa no na hoti; amussa, noti-kiṃ? Amuyā.
anya-e1201n:325_0: Yonaṃ lope nisuva dīgho hoti; aṭṭhi, aṭṭhīni; yolopa nisūti-kiṃ? Rattiyo.
anya-e1201n:327_0: Esu nāmassa dīgho hoti; aggīsu, aggīnaṃ, aggīhani.
anya-e1201n:333_0: Aṃsesu ntappaccayayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ci;’ yaṃ yaṃ hirāja bhajati sataṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ” kiccāni
anya-e1201n:333_1: kubbassa kareyya kiccaṃ”himavaṃca pabbataṃ’,’sujāti manto’pi ajātimassa’ yogavibhāgenāññatrāpi’cakkhumā
anya-e1201n:333_2: andhitā honti” vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti.’
anya-e1201n:335_0: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge;aggaso aggī–-
anya-e1201n:335_3: iggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Daṇḍino; puveti- kiṃ; aṭṭhi.
anya-e1201n:339_0: Yomhī kvaci lasaññassa vā ṭa hoti;
anya-e1201n:339_1: hetayo,’nandanti taṃ kurayo dassanena ajjeva taṃ kurayo pāpayātu’ vāti-
anya-e1201n:341_0: Lasaññato uto yossālapane vevo honti vā pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:343_0: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhisminnaṃ mhābhimhi vā honti yathā kkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:347_0: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti namhi suhisuca;
anya-e1201n:348_0: Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara aññatama;
anya-e1201n:350_0: Yatya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha (iccete sabbādayo )
anya-e1201n:352_0: Sabbādito naṃvacanassa saṃsānaṃ honti; sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:354_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti; sabbassā, sabbāya, paggahaṇamuttaratthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:356_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti; sabbassaṃ, sabbāya; amussaṃ, amuyā.
anya-e1201n:358_0: Ghapato smino yaṃ vā hoti; kaññāyaṃ, daññāya, rattiyaṃ, rattiyā, vadhuyaṃ, vadhuyā, sabbāyaṃ, sabbāya, amuyaṃ, amuyā.
anya-e1201n:360_0: Sabhāparisāhi smino tiṃ vā hoti; sabhatiṃ, sahāya, parisatiṃ, parisāya.
anya-e1201n:362_0: Ehi smino si hoti vā, padasi, padasmiṃ, bilasi, bilasmiṃ.
anya-e1201n:364_0: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā; padasā, padena, bilasā, bilena.
anya-e1201n:366_0: Ehi nāssa sā hoti vā; kodhasā, kodhena, atthasā, atthena.
anya-e1201n:368_0: Akārantato parassa nāvavanassa enādeso hoti; buddhena; atoti-kiṃ?Agginā.
anya-e1201n:370_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa o hoti; buddho; ato tveva-aggi.
anya-e1201n:372_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa e hoti vā kvaci;’vanappa gumbe yathā phussitagge’ apavādavisaye’pi bahulaṃ vidhānā, sukhe, dukkhe–- vāti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:374_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sassa aṃ hoti napuṃsakaliṅge rūpaṃ.
anya-e1201n:376_0: Akārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ ni hoti napuṃsake; sabbāni, rūpāni –-
anya-e1201n:378_0: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake; aṭṭhini, aṭṭhī, āyūni, āyū.
anya-e1201n:380_0: Jhalato yonaṃ lopo hoti; aṭṭhī, āyū, aggī, bhikkhū,
anya-e1201n:382_0: Jantuhetūhi īkārantehi ghapasaññohiva paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti;
anya-e1201n:384_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre;
anya-e1201n:384_2: pokkharañño pokkharañññā pokkharaññaṃ–- vātveva- rattiyo; passāti-
anya-e1201n:386_0: Nāmasmā gasīnaṃ lopo hoti vijjhantarābhāve; bho purisa, ayaṃ daddhī.
anya-e1201n:388_0: Avijjamānasaṅkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopohoti;va vā evaevaṃ.
anya-e1201n:390_0: Ekatthībhāve sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti bahulaṃ;
anya-e1201n:392_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti;
anya-e1201n:394_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo na hoti astu bhavatyapañcamyā;
anya-e1201n:396_0: Amādekatthā pubbaṃ yadekatthamakārantaṃ tato parāsaṃ tatiyāsattaminaṃ vā aṃ hoti;
anya-e1201n:398_0: Nāmhi rājassi vā hoti; sabbadattena rājinā; vātve varaññā.
anya-e1201n:400_0: Rājassa ū hoti vā sunaṃhisu; rājūsu rājesu, rājūnaṃ raññaṃ, rājūbhi rājebhi.
anya-e1201n:404_0: Imasaddassānitthiyaṃ nāmhi anैmi iccādesā honti; anena, iminā; anitthiyaṃtveva-imāya.
anya-e1201n:406_0: Imasaddassānapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi; ayaṃ puriso, ayaṃ itthī; anapuṃsakassāti-kiṃ?Imaṃ.
anya-e1201n:408_2: syā itthi; evaṃ so, sā, eso, esā –-
anya-e1201n:410_0: Anapuṃsakassāmussa makārassa so hoti simhi; asu puriso, asu itthi.
anya-e1201n:412_0: Amussa massa ke vā so hoti; asuko amuko, asukā amukā, asukaṃ amukaṃ, asukāni amukāni.
anya-e1201n:414_0: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsuvibhattīsu; ne, te, nāyo, tāyo, naṃ, taṃ, nāni, tāni iccādi.
anya-e1201n:416_0: Sādisvimassa tatassa ca ṭo vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:418_0: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti;’ yonajja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ atthadhammavidū ise’ vātveva-isi.
anya-e1201n:420_0: Isismā parassa duyāyossa ṭe vā hoti;’ samaṇe brāhmaṇe vande sampannacaraṇe ise’ vātveva-
anya-e1201n:424_0: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti; ekaccāni.
anya-e1201n:425_0: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti; sabbāni.
anya-e1201n:427_0: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonameṭa hoti; sabbe tiṭṭhanti sabbe passa; atotveva-sabbāyo.
anya-e1201n:429_0: Nāmabhutehi appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādikāriyantaṃ na hoti; te sabbā,
anya-e1201n:431_0: Tatiyatthena yoge sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādi kāriyantaṃ na hoti;
anya-e1201n:433_0: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ caññaṃ sabbādi kāriyantaṃ na hoti;
anya-e1201n:435_0: Catthasamāsavisaye sabbādīhi yasseṭa vutto tassa vā hoti; pubbuttare, pubbuttarā.
anya-e1201n:437_0: Etehi pubbādīhi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hoti?Pubbe pubbā,
anya-e1201n:439_0: Manādīhi samīmādīnaṃ sisoosāsā vā honti yathākkaṃ;
anya-e1201n:440_0: Mana tama tapa teja sira ura vaca oja raja yasa paya
anya-e1201n:445_0: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti gayonāse; bhonta, bhavaṃ, bhonto, bhavanto, bhotā, bhavatā, bhoto, bhavato–- bho iti-
anya-e1201n:445_1: āmantaṇe nipāto’kutonu āgacchatha bho tayo janā’evaṃ bhanteti- bhaddeti-
anya-e1201n:447_0: Aggismā sissa ni hoti vā; agginī,aggi.
anya-e1201n:449_0: Simhi ntappaccayassa aṃ hoti vā; gacchaṃ, gacchanto.
anya-e1201n:451_0: Bhudhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā; bhavaṃ.
anya-e1201n:453_0: Simhi mahantārahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti; mahā, mahaṃ, arahā, arahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:459_0: Himavato simhi ntussa o vā hoti; himavanto, himavā.
anya-e1201n:461_0: Rājādīhi yayuvādīhi ca sissa ā hoti; rājā, yayuvā–-rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma.
anya-e1201n:465_0: Aṇimā, laghimā–-yuva sā suvā maghava puma vattaha.
anya-e1201n:467_0: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnaṃ cānaṅi hoti vāmhi; [ ] rājānaṃ, rājaṃ, yuvānaṃ, yuvaṃ.
anya-e1201n:469_0: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yonamāno vā hoti; rājāno, yuvāno–-vātveva-rājā,rāje, yuvā, yuve.
anya-e1201n:471_0: Sakhato yonamāyono honti vā āno ca; sakhāyo, sakhino, sakhāno?Vātveva-sakhā, sakhe.
anya-e1201n:473_0: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti; sakhe niccattho’yamārambho.
anya-e1201n:475_0: Sakhassa i hoti nonāsesu; sakhino, sakhinā, sakhissa.
anya-e1201n:477_0: Sakhassa vā i hotī smānaṃsu; sakhismā, sakhasmā, sakhīnaṃ, sakhānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:479_0: Sakhassa vā āraṅi hoti yosvaṃhisusmānaṃsu ca;
anya-e1201n:481_0: Latuppaccayantānaṃ pitādīnaṃ cāraṅi bhoti sato’ññatra; kattāro, pitaro, kattāraṃ, pitaraṃ, kattārā, pitarā, kattari, pitari–- aseti-
anya-e1201n:483_0: Namhi latupitādīnamāraṅi vā hoti; kattārānaṃ, kattunaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitunnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:486_0: Namhi latupitādīnamā vā hoti; kattānaṃ, kattūnaṃ, pitānaṃ, pitunnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:488_0: Latupitādīhi sassa lopo vā hoti; kattu, kattuno, sakamandhātu, sakamandhātuno, pitu, pituno.
anya-e1201n:492_0: Yosu nadīsaddassa āmi vā hoti; najjāyo, nadiyo.
anya-e1201n:494_0: Katimhā yonaṃ ṭi hoti; kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passa.
anya-e1201n:496_0: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṃkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭo hoti;
anya-e1201n:498_0: Ubhagohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti; ubho, ubho, gāvo, gāvo–- kathaṃ?
anya-e1201n:500_0: Āraṅādesato paresaṃ yonaṃ ṭo hoti; sakhāro, kattāro, pataro.
anya-e1201n:502_0: Āraṅādesamhā yonaṃ ṭoṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃ; sakhāro, sakhāre, sakhāro–-ṭoggahaṇaṃ lāghavatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:504_0: Āraṅādesamhā nāsmānaṃ ṭā hoti; kattārā, kattārā, kvaci vā hoti bahakulādhikārā; etādisā sakhārasmā
anya-e1201n:506_0: Āraṅādesamhā smino ṭi hoti; kattari, pitari.
anya-e1201n:508_0: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti; divi, bhuvi–-niccaṃ vakārāgamo.
anya-e1201n:510_0: Smimhi āro rasso hoti; kattari, nattari.
anya-e1201n:512_0: Nattvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīnamāro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattisu; pitaro, pitaraṃ–-
anya-e1201n:514_0: Suhisu yuvādīnaṃ ānaṅi hoti; yayuvānesu, yuvānehi.
anya-e1201n:516_0: Esu yuvādīnamā hoti; yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e1201n:518_0: Yuvādīhiṃ smāsminnaṃ nāne honti yathākkamaṃ; yuvānā, yuvāne.
anya-e1201n:520_0: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamiṃ;
anya-e1201n:522_0: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ none vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge,
anya-e1201n:524_0: Aññapadatthe vattamānā ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne hoti vā kvaci;’ kataññumhi ca posamhi sīlavante ariyavuttine’ vātveva-
anya-e1201n:526_0: Pumasaddato smino yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vā hoti; pumānepume.
anya-e1201n:528_0: Pumassa nāmhi yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ vā hoti; pumānā pumena.
anya-e1201n:530_0: Pumassa sumhi yaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ ā ca vā hoti; pumānesu, pumesu, pumāsu.
anya-e1201n:532_0: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti; bho pumaṃ, bho puma, bho itthipumaṃ, bho itthipuma.
anya-e1201n:534_0: Sāsaddassa ānaṅi hoti aṃse ge ca; sānaṃ, sānassa, bho sāna.
anya-e1201n:536_0: Vattahā sanannaṃ nonānaṃ honti yathākkama; vattahā no, vattahānānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:538_0: Brahmassu vā hoti sanaṃsu; brahmuno, brahmassa, brahmūnaṃ brahmānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:542_0: Pudīnamu hoti vā sasmāsu nāmhi ca; pumuno, pumassa; pumunā, pumānā, pumunā, pumānā; kammuno, kammassa;
anya-e1201n:542_2: ṭhāmassa;ṭhāmunā, ṭhāmasmā; ṭhāmunā, ṭhāmena; addhuno, addhassa; addhunā,
anya-e1201n:544_0: Yuvā sassavā ino hoti, yuvino, yuvassa.
anya-e1201n:546_0: Attātumehi sassa no hoti vā; attano, attassa; ātumano, ātumassa.
anya-e1201n:548_0: Attaātumānaṃ suhisu vā naka hoti; attanesu, attesu,
anya-e1201n:550_0: Brahma attaātumehi ca smāssa nā hoti; brahmunā, attanā, ātumanā.
anya-e1201n:552_2: ime bhikkhū vinayamajjhāpaya atho ene dhammamajjhāpaya;
anya-e1201n:554_0: Sabbāsu vibhattisukissako hoti; ko, ke, kā, kāyo, kaṃ, kāni, keneccādi.
anya-e1201n:556_0: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu; kissa, kassa, kismiṃ, kasmiṃ; anitthiyanti-kiṃ? Ko, kaṃ.
anya-e1201n:558_0: Aṃsisu saha tehiimassidaṃ hoti vā napuṃsake; idaṃ, imaṃ; idaṃ,imaṃ.
anya-e1201n:560_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi amussa aduṃ hoti vā napuṃsake; aduṃ, amuṃ; aduṃ, amuṃ.
anya-e1201n:562_0: Ahmassa asmā hoti vā sumhi; bhattīrasmāsu sā tava; vātveva-amhesu.
anya-e1201n:565_1: Vibhattisahitānaṃ tivatunnaṃ yomhi tisso catasso hontitthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:567_0: Yomhisavibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃtīṇi cattāri honti napuṃsake; tīṇi, cattāri.
anya-e1201n:569_0: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ tayocattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge; tayo, cattāro.
anya-e1201n:571_0: Catusaddassa savibhattissa yombhi caturo vā hoti pulliṅge;
anya-e1201n:573_0: Yeyāsvamhassa savibhattissaasmākaṃmamaṃ honti vā yathākkamaṃ; asmākaṃ, amhākaṃ; mamaṃ, mama.
anya-e1201n:575_0: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti; ahaṃ.
anya-e1201n:577_0: Amhī simhi ca tuhmassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; tuvaṃ, tvaṃ.
anya-e1201n:579_0: Tumhassatayātayīnaṃ takārassatva hoti vā; tvayā, tayā; tvayi, tayi.
anya-e1201n:581_0: Smāmhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhā hoti vā; pattā nissaṃsayaṃ [ ] tvamhā–-vātveva-tvayā.
anya-e1201n:583_0: Paṭhame yomhi ntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ nto iccādeso vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:585_0: Namhi ntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ taṃ vā hoti; gacchataṃ, gacchantānaṃ; guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e1201n:587_0: Sādisuntantunaṃ savibhattinaṃ totātitā honti vā yathākkamaṃ; gacchato,
anya-e1201n:589_0: Ge pare ntantunaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭaṭāaṃ iccādesā honti;
anya-e1201n:591_0: Yomhi dvissa savibhattissa duvedve honti paccekaṃ; duve, dve.
anya-e1201n:593_0: Namhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā; duvinnaṃ, dvinnaṃ.
anya-e1201n:595_0: Namhi rājasaddassasavibhattissaraññaṃ hoti vā; raññaṃ, rajānaṃ
anya-e1201n:597_0: Nāsmāsu rājassa savibhattissaraññā hoti, raññā kataṃ, raññānissaṭaṃ.
anya-e1201n:599_0: Se rājassa savibhattissa raññoraññassarājino hontī; rañño, raññassa, rājino.
anya-e1201n:601_0: Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññerājini honti; raññe,rājini.
anya-e1201n:605_0: Smimhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayimayi honti yathākkamaṃ; tayi,mayayi.
anya-e1201n:607_0: Amhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃmaṃtavaṃmamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e1201n:609_0: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayāmayā honti yathākkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:611_0: Setumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavamamatuyhaṃmayhaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; tava, tuyhaṃ; mama,mayhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:613_0: Namhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ honti paccekaṃ; tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ–-
anya-e1201n:615_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ paccekaṃ ṅaṃṅākaṃ vā honti yomhi dutiye;
anya-e1201n:617_0: Idamadhikataṃ veditabbaṃ; pajjate’nenatthoti-padaṃ, syādyantaṃ tyādyāntañca; padasamūho vākyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:619_0: Apañcamiyā yonaṃhisvapādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ vo no honti vā yathākkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:625_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresaṃ eka vākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaambhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ teme vā honti yathākkamaṃ; kataṃ te,
anya-e1201n:629_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṃ tumhaamhasaddānamā desā vā honti anvādese’pi;
anya-e1201n:633_0: Dassanatthesu ālocanavajjitesu payujjamānesu tumha amhasaddānamādesā na honti;
anya-e1201n:635_0: Āmantaṇaṃ pubbamavijjamānaṃ viya hoti tumhaamhasaddāna mādesavisaye;
anya-e1201n:635_4: kiṃ?’Mayetaṃ sabba makkhātaṃ tumhākaṃ dvijapuṅgavā’ parassa hi [ ] avijjamānantā apādādoti-

anya-e1201n:747_0: Asaṃkhyehi saṃkhyāhi ca parāya aṅgulyā samāsanto ahoti no ce aññapadatthe asaṃkhyattheva samāso vattite.’Niggatamaṅgulīhi’ niraṅgulaṃ;

anya-e1201n:755_0: Anugavanti nipaccate āyāme gamyamāne; anugavaṃ, sakaṭaṃ–-āyāmeti-kiṃ? Gunnaṃ pacchā anugu.

anya-e1201n:906_0: Seti paṭhamantā assāti chaṭṭhatthe ṇo bhavati yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ sā ve devatā puṇṇamāsī vā.’Sugato devatā assā’ti sogato; māhindo; yāmo; vāruṇo;

anya-e1201n:906_7: puṇṇamāsīva gatakamāsasambandhinī na hoti;’puṇṇo mā assanti’ nibbacanā–-
anya-e1201n:908_0: Dutiyantato tamadhīte taṃ jānātīti etesphatthesuṇo hoti ko ṇikova.’ Vyākaraṇamadhīte jānāti vā’ veyyākaraṇo; chāndaso; kamako; padako; venayiko;
anya-e1201n:908_2: dvitaggahaṇaṃ puthageva vidhānatthaṃ jānanassaca ajjhenavisayabhāvadassanatthaṃ pasimbupasaṃgahatthañca.
anya-e1201n:910_0: Chaṭhiyantā visaye desarūpe ṇo hoti.’Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso’vāsāto–-
anya-e1201n:912_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nivāse dese tannāme ṇo hoti;’sivīnaṃ nivāso desosebyo; vāsāto.
anya-e1201n:914_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā adūrabhave desetannāme ṇo hoti;’vidasāya adurabhavaṃ’ vedisaṃ.
anya-e1201n:918_0: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti,
anya-e1201n:918_1: yantaṃ paṭhamantamatthi ce;’udumbarā asmiṃ dese santī’ti odumbaro, bādaro, babbajo.
anya-e1201n:920_0: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇo hoti;’udake bhavo’odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho, kāpilavatthavo, kosambo.
anya-e1201n:922_0: Bhavatthe ajjādīhi tano hoti;’ajja bhavo’ ajjatano, svātano, hiyyattano.
anya-e1201n:924_0: Purā iccasmā bhavatthe ṇo hoti tano ca; purāṇo, purātano.
anya-e1201n:925_0: Amātthacco-. Amāsaddato acco hoti bhavatthe; amacco.
anya-e1201n:927_0: Majjhādīhi sattamyantehi bhavatthe imo hoti; majjhimo, antimo–-
anya-e1201n:927_1: majkjdhaanta heṭṭhā upari ora pāra pacchā abbhantara paccanta.
anya-e1201n:929_0: Sattamyantā ete paccayā honti bhavatthe; kaṇa-
anya-e1201n:931_0: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti; sāradiko, divaso; sāradikā, ratti.
anya-e1201n:932_0: Tamassa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ-.
anya-e1201n:933_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaḍhatthe ṇiko hoti;’vīṇāvādanaṃ sippamassa’ veṇiko,
anya-e1201n:934_1: Dutiyantā hantīti evamādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti; pakkhīhi-
anya-e1201n:935_0: Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddhamahisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaḍhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jivati-.
anya-e1201n:936_0: Tatiyantā katādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’kāyena kataṃ’ kāyikaṃ,
anya-e1201n:936_7: ’ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā’ ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dādhikaṃ,
anya-e1201n:936_16: devadattena jitamaṅgulyā khaṇatīti na hoti tadatthā navagamā–-
anya-e1201n:938_0: Catutthyantā saṃvattati asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti;’punabbhavāya saṃvattatī’ti ponobhaviko, itthiyaṃ-
anya-e1201n:938_1: ponobhavikā;’lokāya saṃvattatī’ti lokiko,’ suṭṭhu aggo’ti saggo,’saggāya saṃvattatī’ti sovaggiko,
anya-e1201n:940_0: Pañcamyantā sambhutamāgatantietesvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’mātito sambhutamāgatanti vā’ mattikaṃ,
anya-e1201n:940_3: ’surabhito sambhutaṃ’ sorabhyaṃ;’thanato sambhutaṃ’ thaññaṃ;’pitito sambhuto’ pettiyo, mātiyo, mattiyo; macco vā.
anya-e1201n:942_0: Sattamyantā vasatītvevamādisvatthesu ṇiko hoti;’rukkhamūle vasatī’ti rukkhamuliko,āraññiko,
anya-e1201n:942_1: sosāniko;’loke vidito’ lokiko;’catumahārājesu bhattā’ cātummahārājikā;;dvāre niyutto’ dovāriko;
anya-e1201n:944_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃatthe ṇiko hoti;’saṅghassa idaṃ’ saṅghikaṃ,
anya-e1201n:946_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā idamiccasmiṃ atthe ṇo hoti;’kaccāyanassैdaṃ’ kaccāyanaṃ,
anya-e1201n:948_0: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi idamiccasmiṃ atthe yo hoti;’gunnaṃ idaṃ’gabyaṃ, maṃsādi; kabyaṃ, dabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:950_0: Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa hoti;’pitubhātā’ petteyyo.
anya-e1201n:952_0: Mātito pitito ca tesaṃ bhaginīyaṃ cho hoti;’mātu bhagini’ mātucchā;’pitubhaginī’ pitucchā–-
anya-e1201n:954_0: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitusvāmaho hoti;’mātumātā’ mātāmahī;’mātupitā’ mātāmaho;’pitumātā’ patāmahī;’pitupitā’ pitāmaho–-
anya-e1201n:956_0: Mātāpituhi hite reyyaṇa hoti; matteyyo, petteyyo.
anya-e1201n:958_0: Nindādīsvatthesu nāmasmā ko hoti; nindāyaṃ-muṇḍako, samaṇako; aññāte-’kassāyaṃ asso’ti assako–-
anya-e1201n:961_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca,
anya-e1201n:961_1: taṃ ce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’parimiyate’tene’ti parimāṇaṃ–-
anya-e1201n:963_1: taṃ ve paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’yaṃ paramāṇamassa yantakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ; āvatake- yāvatako, tāvatako.
anya-e1201n:965_0: Sabbato paṭhamantehi yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhatthe āvantu hoti,
anya-e1201n:965_1: taṃ ve paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’sabbaṃ parimāṇamassa’ sabbāvantaṃ, yāvantaṃ, tāvantaṃ,
anya-e1201n:967_0: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhatthe ratirīvarīvatakarittakā honti,
anya-e1201n:967_1: taṃ ce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati;’kiṃ saṃkhyānaṃ parimāṇamesaṃ’ kati, ete; kiva,
anya-e1201n:969_1: te ve saṃjātā honti;’tārakāsaṃjātā assa’ tārakitaṃ, gaganaṃ; pupphīto, rukkho;
anya-e1201n:971_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe mattohoti;’palaṃ ummānamassa’ palamattaṃ,’hattho pamāṇamassa’
anya-e1201n:973_0: Uddhamānavuttito asseti chaṭṭhatthe tagghā hotīmैtto ca; jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
anya-e1201n:975_0: Purisā paṭhamantā uddhamānavuttito ṇo hoti mattādayo ca; porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ, purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e1201n:977_0: Ubavitīhi avayavavuttīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhatthe ayo hoti;’ ubho aṃsā assa’ ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:979_0: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya ca saṃkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe ḍo hoti,
anya-e1201n:980_0: Sahassaṃ vā hoti;’vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sate’ti vīsaṃsataṃ,
anya-e1201n:982_0: Chaṭṭhīyantāyekādasādikāya saṃkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā;
anya-e1201n:984_0: Chaṭṭhīyantāya paṃcādikāya saṃkhyāyakatismā ca mo hoti pūraṇatthe; pañcamo, sattamo, aṭṭhamo; katimo, katimī.
anya-e1201n:986_0: Satādikāya saṃkhyāya chaṭṭhiyantāya puraṇatthe mo hoti, satādinamicāntādeso; satimo, sahassimo.
anya-e1201n:990_0: Ekasmā asahāyatthe kaāki honti vā; ekako, ekāki, eko.
anya-e1201n:996_0: Tatiyantā datte’bhidheye lैyā honti;’devenadatto; devalo; deviyo; brahmalo;
anya-e1201n:998_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ;
anya-e1201n:998_1: na ca sabbe sabbato honti,añaññatra ttatāhi–-
anya-e1201n:998_15: ālasyaṃ brahmaññaṃ cāpalyaṃ nepuññaṃpesuññaṃ rajjaṃ ādhipaccaṃ dāyajjaṃ vesammaṃ;
anya-e1201n:998_21: ālasiyaṃ kālusiyaṃ mandiyaṃ dakkhiyaṃ porohitiyaṃ veyyattiyaṃ–- kathaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1000_0: Chaṭṭhayantā vaddhā dāsā ca byo vāhoti bhāvakammesu;
anya-e1201n:1002_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā yuvasdā bhāvakammesunaṇa vā hoti, vassabo ca; yobbanaṃ; vātveva-yuvattaṃ, yuvatā.
anya-e1201n:1004_0: Aṇuādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi bhāve vā ime hoti; aṇimā; laghimā; mahimā;kasimā–-vātveva-aṇuttaṃ; aṇutā.
anya-e1201n:1006_0: Bhāvavācakā saddā tena nibbatte’bhidheye imo hoti;’pākena nibbattaṃ’ pākimaṃ; sekimaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1008_0: Atisaye vattamānato hontete paccayā;’atisayena pāpo’ pāpataro; pāpatamo,
anya-e1201n:1010_0: Dutiyantā llappaccayo hoti nissitatthe;’vedanissitaṃ’ vedallaṃ;’ duṭhunissitaṃ’ duṭṭhullaṃ–- ille-
anya-e1201n:1012_1: chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre’vayave ca ṇādayohontibahulaṃ; ṇa- āyasaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1012_4: odumbaraṃ, bhasmaṃ; kāpātैṃ, maṃsaṃ; kāpotaṃ, satthi –- ṇika-
anya-e1201n:1012_6: eṇeyyaṃ,maṃsaṃ; eṇeyyaṃ, satthi; koseyyaṃ, vatthaṃ–- maya-
anya-e1201n:1014_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmājatuto vikāravayavesussaṇvā hoti;’jatuno vikāro’ jātussaṃjātumayaṃ–- “lopo“ti.
anya-e1201n:1014_1: Bahulaṃ paccayalopo’pi phalapupphamūlesuvikārāvayavesu;’ piyālassa phalāni’ piyālāni;’mallikāya pupphāni’ pallikā;’usīrassa mūlaṃ’usīraṃ–-
anya-e1201n:1016_8: dhenukaṃ–- ṇa- kākaṃ; bhikkhaṃ; ṇika- acittā- āpūpikaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1018_0: Janādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi samūhe tā hoti; janatā; gajatā; bandhutā; gāmatā; sahāyatā;
anya-e1201n:1020_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā hite iyo hoti; upādāniyaṃ–-aññatrāpi’samānādैre sayito’ sodariyo.
anya-e1201n:1022_0: Chaṭṭhiyantehi cakkhuādīhi hite ssohoti; cakkhūssaṃ; āyussaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1024_0: Sattamyantā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇyyo hoti; sabbho;
anya-e1201n:1026_0: Sattamyantā kammasadadā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe niyaññā honti;’ kamme sādhu’ kammaniyaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1028_0: Kathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe iko hoti; kathiko;
anya-e1201n:1030_0: Pathādīhi sattamyantehi tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇeyyo hoti; pātheyyaṃ; sāpateyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1032_0: Dakkhiṇāsaddato arahatthe ṇeyyo hoti;’dakkhiṇaṃ arahatī’ti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e1201n:1036_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthiti etesvatthesu mantu hoti;’gāmo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti’ gomā–-
anya-e1201n:1036_1: atthiti vattamānakālopādānato bhutāhi bhavissantīhi vā gohi na gomā.
anya-e1201n:1037_0: Pahūte ca pasaṃsāyaṃ nindāyañcātisāyane niccayoge ca saṃsagge hontime mantuādayo.
anya-e1201n:1038_3: ye sattu guṇasaddānaṃ dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi tehi honteva–-
anya-e1201n:1038_4: budhimā rūpavā rasavā gandhavā essavā saddavā;
anya-e1201n:1040_0: Paṭhamantato avaṇṇantā mantvatthe vantu hoti; sīlavā; paññavā–-avaṇṇāti-kiṃ? Satimā; bandhumā.
anya-e1201n:1042_2: kutocekamekaṃva. Daṇḍako, daṇḍi, daṇḍavā; gandhiko, gandhī, gandhavā; rūpiko, rūpī, rūpavā–-
anya-e1201n:1043_9: pokkharādito dese() pokkharaṇī uppalinī kumudinī bhisinī muḷālinī sālukinī –-
anya-e1201n:1043_15: (sikhādihī vā)() sikhi sikhāvā mālī makālāvā sīli sīlavā balī balavā –-
anya-e1201n:1045_0: Tapādito mantvatthe vā ssi hoti; tapassi, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī –-vātveva-yasavā.
anya-e1201n:1047_1: susiro ūsaro, madhuro, kharo, kujaro, nagaro –-
anya-e1201n:1049_0: Tuṇḍiādīhi mantvatthe bho vā hoti; tuṇḍibho, sāḷibho,valibho, vātveva-tuṇḍimā.
anya-e1201n:1051_0: Saddhādīhi mantvatthe a hoti vā; sanddho, pañño; itthiyaṃ-saddhā; vātveva-paññavā.
anya-e1201n:1053_0: Tapā ṇo hoti mantvatthe; tāpaso; itthiyaṃ-tāpasī.
anya-e1201n:1054_2: abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu–- vātveva- dayāvā.
anya-e1201n:1056_0: Picchādīhi ilo hoti cā mantvatthe; picchilo, picchavā; pheṇilo, pheṇavā; jaṭilo, jaṭāvā;–-
anya-e1201n:1058_0: Sīlādihi vo hoti vā mैntvatthe; sīlavo, sīlavā; kesavo, kesavā–-
anya-e1201n:1060_0: Etehi dvīhi vī hoti mantvatthe; māyāvi, medhāvī.
anya-e1201n:1062_0: Sasaddā āmyuvāmī hontissare’bhidheye mantvatthe;’samassatthiti’ sāmī, suvāmī.
anya-e1201n:1064_0: Lakkhīsaddāṇo hota mantvatthe; a cantassa; ṇakāro’va savo; lakkhaṇo.
anya-e1201n:1070_0: Mantvatthe imैyā honti bahulaṃ; puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo,hānabhāgiyo, seniyo.
anya-e1201n:1074_0: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭa eta kiṃsaddassa kuttaca; ito, imasmā; ato, etto, etasmā; kuto, kasmā.
anya-e1201n:1076_0: Abhiādīhi to hoti; abhito, parito, pacchato, heṭṭhato.
anya-e1201n:1078_0: Ādippabhutīhi to vā hoti; ādo, ādito; majjhato, antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato–-
anya-e1201n:1080_0: Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tratthā vā honti; sabbatra,
anya-e1201n:1082_0: Ete saddā nipaccante; kasmiṃ kattha, kutra, kva; etasmiṃ ettha, atra; asmiṃ iha, idha.
anya-e1201n:1084_0: Sattamyantato sabbasmādhi vā hoti; sabbadhi; sabbattha.
anya-e1201n:1086_0: Sattamyantā yato hiṃ vā hoti; yahiṃ, yatra.
anya-e1201n:1088_0: Sattamyantā tato vā haṃ hoti hiñca; tahaṃ, tahiṃ, tatra.
anya-e1201n:1090_0: Kiṃsaddā sattamyantā hiṃhaṃ nipaccante kissa kukā ca; kihiṃ, kahaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1092_0: Etehi sattamyantehi cattamānehi kāle dā hoti;
anya-e1201n:1092_1: sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā; ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā–- kāleti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1094_0: Ete saddā nipaccante; tasmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā; sambasmiṃ kāle sadā; imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e1201n:1096_1: ekatippaccayo ādeso kāla visesoti sabbametaṃ nipātanā labbhati;
anya-e1201n:1098_1: tattha vattamānehi sabbādīhi thā hoti sabbenapakārena sabbathā; yathā, tathā.
anya-e1201n:1100_0: Ete saddā nipaccante pakāre; kimimehi thaṃ paccayo, kैcca tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ; kathamitthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1102_0: Saṅkhyāvācīhi pakāre dhā paro hoti;’dvīhi pakārehi dve vā pakārekaroti’ vidhākaroti;
anya-e1201n:1102_1: bahudhā karoti;’ekaṃ rāsiṃ pañcappakāraṃ karoti’ pañcadhā karoti?Pañcappakāramekappakāraṃ karoti’ ekadhākaroti.
anya-e1201n:1104_0: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṃ vā hoti; ekajkvaṅkaroti; ekadhā karoti.
anya-e1201n:1106_0: Dvītihi pakāre edhāvā hoti; vedhā, tedhā; dvidhā, tidhā.
anya-e1201n:1108_0: Pakāravati taṃsāmaññavācakā saddājātiyo hoti; paṭu jātiyo, mudujātiyo.
anya-e1201n:1110_0: Vārasambandhiniyā saṃkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti;’dve vāre bhuñjati’ dvikkhattuṃ divasassa bhuñjati;
anya-e1201n:1112_0: Vārasambandhiniyā katisaṃkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti;’kati vāre bhuñjani’katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1116_0: Ekaṃ vāramiccasmiṃ atthe sakinti vā nipaccate;’ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjati’–-vāti kiṃ?Ekakkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e1201n:1118_0: Vīcchāyaṃ pakāre ca so hoti bahulaṃ; vīcchāyaṃ-khaṇḍaso, bilaso; pakāre-puthuso,sabbaso.
anya-e1201n:1120_0: Avatthāvato vatthantarenābhutassa tāyāvatthāya bhāve karāsabhuhi sambandhesati vikāravācakācī hoti;’adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti’ dhavalī karoti;
anya-e1201n:1122_0: Vuttato’ññe’pi paccayā dissanti vuttāvuttatthesu;’vividhā mātaro’ vimātaro,’tāsaṃ puttā’ vemātīkā-
anya-e1201n:1124_0: Vuttato’ññasmimpi atthe vuttappaccayā dissanti;’magadhānaṃ issaro’ māgadho-
anya-e1201n:1126_0: Sakatthe’pi paccayā dissanti; hīnako, potako, kicacayayaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1128_2: cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyeyana vāti bhāvappaccaya lopo.
anya-e1201n:1130_0: Sarānamādibhutā ye akārivaṇṇuvaṇṇā tesaṃ āño honti yathākkamaṃ ṇānubandhe; rāghavo,
anya-e1201n:1132_0: Sarānamādibhutā ye ayuvaṇṇā tesaṃ āño honti kvaci deva saṃyogavisaye ṇānubandhe;decco,
anya-e1201n:1134_0: Majjhe vattamānānampi ayuvaṇṇānaṃ āño honti kvaci; aḍḍhateyyā, vāseṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1136_0: Ete saddā nipaccante ṇānubandhe;’kusītassa bhāvo’ kosajjajaṃ;’ ujuno bhāvo’ appavaṃ;’parisāsu sādhu’
anya-e1201n:1136_1: pārisajjo;’suhadayoca’ suhajjo,’tassa pana bhāvo sohajjaṃ;’muduno bhāvo’maddavaṃ;’isino idaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1136_3: bhāvo vā’ āsabhaṃ;’ājānīyassa bhāvo’ so eva vā’ ājaññaṃ;’thenassa bhāvo,
anya-e1201n:1138_0: Manādīnaṃ saka hoti ṇānubandhe;’manasi bhavaṃ’ mānasaṃ;’dummanaso bhāvo’ domanassaṃ; somanassaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1141_0: Yakārādo paccaya gैossuvaṇṇassa ca avaṅi hoti; gabyaṃ, gātabyo.
anya-e1201n:1143_0: Yakārādo paccaye avaṇṇivaṇṇānaṃ lāpo hoti, dāyjैjaṃ, kāruññaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1145_0: Anto saro ādi yassāvayavassa tassa lopo hoti rānubandhe; kittakaṃ, petteyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1147_0: Kisassa mahato ime kasmahā honti yathākkamaṃ; kasimā, mahimā.
anya-e1201n:1151_0: Vuddhassa jo hoti iyैṭṭhesu; jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1153_0: Iyeṭṭhesu bāḷhantikapasatthānaṃ sādhanedasā hontī yathākkamaṃ; sādhiyo,
anya-e1201n:1155_0: Iyeṭṭhesu appayuvānaṃ kaṇkanā honti yayathākkamaṃ; kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho; kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1157_0: Vīmantuvantunaṃ lopo hoti iyैṭṭhesu?’Atisayena medhāvī’ medhiyo,
anya-e1201n:1159_0: Se pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti; vīsaṃ sataṃ, tiṃsaṃ sataṃ.
anya-e1201n:1161_0: Ttake pare etassa eṭa henāti; ettakaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1165_0: Ghe pare adhātussa yo kakāro tato pubbassa akārassa bakahulaṃ i hoti,
anya-e1201n:1165_1: save ghona syādito paro hoti; bālikā, kārikā–-
anya-e1201n:1165_7: bahucammikāti kakārena syādino byavahitattā siddhaṃ–- gheti- kiṃ? Bālako; assāti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1166_0: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ ṇādikaṇḍo catuttho.
anya-e1201n:1168_0: Khantiyaṃ tijā vīmaṃsāyaṃ mānā ca khasappaccayā honti yathākkamaṃ; titikkhā, vīmaṃsā–-
anya-e1201n:1168_3: Khamāvīmaṃsā suti- kiṃ? Tejanaṃ, tejo, tejayati, mānanaṃ, māno, māneti.
anya-e1201n:1170_0: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā jo hoti–- tikicchā,
anya-e1201n:1176_0: Icchākammato icchāyamatthe īyappaccayo hoti;’puttamicchati’ puttīyati–- kammāti- kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1176_2: idha kasmā na hoti rañño puttamicchatīti?
anya-e1201n:1178_0: Kammato upamānā āvāratthe īyo hoti;’puttamavā carati’ puttīyati māṇavakaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1180_0: Ādhāratupamānāāvāratthe īyo hoti;’kuṭiyamivācarati’ kuṭiyati pāsāde, pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1184_6: iha kasmā na hoti bhusi bhavatīti?
anya-e1201n:1186_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti; saddāyati, verāyati, kalahāyati, dhūpāyati.
anya-e1201n:1188_0: Namo iccasmā karotīti asmiṃ atthe asso hoti; namassati tathāgataṃ.
anya-e1201n:1190_0: Nāmasmā dhātvatthe bahulami hoti;’hatthinā atikkamati’ati hatthayati;’ vīṇāya upagāyati’ upavīṇayati;’daḷahaṃ
anya-e1201n:1190_1: karoti’ vinayaṃ daḷahayati;’ visuddhā hoti’ ratti visuddhayati;’kusalaṃ pucchati’kusalayati.
anya-e1201n:1192_0: Saccādīhi dhātvatthe āpi hoti; saccāpeti, atthāpeti, vedāpeti, sukkhāpeti sukhāpeti, dukkhāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1194_0: Ayamadhikāro ā satthaparisamattiyā;’kriyā attho yassaso kriyattho’,dhātu.
anya-e1201n:1196_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti bahulaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1198_0: Kattāraṃ yo payojayati tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇiṇāpī honti bahulaṃ; kāreti,
anya-e1201n:1198_2: nanu ca kattāpi karaṇādīnaṃpayojakoti tabyāpāre?Pi ṇiṇāpī pāpuṇanti?
anya-e1201n:1200_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu mānantatyādisu paresukyo hoti krayatthā–-
anya-e1201n:1200_15: ayamadhikāro ā“tanāditvo“apivaete tyādayo tyādisu parabhutesu kattukammabhāvavihitesu kyalādīnaṃ vidhānato tesveva viññayantīti-
anya-e1201n:1200_16: akammakehi dhātuhi kattubhāvesu sakammakehi kattukammesukammāvacanicchāyaṃ bhāveva bhavantīti veditabbā–-
anya-e1201n:1200_18: Yassa tu kriyā kattumattamapekkhate so akammakoti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1209_0: Divādīhi lavīsaye yaka hoti; dibbanto; dibbati.
anya-e1201n:1211_0: Tudādīhi lavīsaye ko hoti; tudamāno, tudanto; kudati.
anya-e1201n:1213_0: Jiādīhi lavisaye knā hoti; jinanto, jināti–-kathaṃ jayanto, jayatīni? Bhuvādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1215_0: Kīādīhi lavisaye kṇā hoti; kiṇanto, kiṇāti.
anya-e1201n:1217_0: Suādīhi lavisaye kṇo hoti; suṇamāno, suṇanto, suṇoti; kathaṃ suṇātīti? Kyādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1224_0: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ; vākyaṃ, kāriyaṃ, veyyaṃ, jeyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1226_0: Āto ghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu āssa e ca; deyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1228_0: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulamhāvakammesu; vajjaṃ, majjaṃ, gammaṃ–-
anya-e1201n:1232_0: Guhādīhi kriyatthehi bhāvakammesu yaka hoti; guyhaṃ, duyhaṃ, sisso;
anya-e1201n:1232_1: siddhā evete tabbādayo pesātisaggapattakālesupi gamyamānesu sāmaññena vidhānato–-
anya-e1201n:1232_2: hotā khalu kaṭo kattabbo, karaṇīyo, kāriyo, kicco-
anya-e1201n:1232_6: evaṃ uddhamuhuttike’pi vattamānato pesādisu siddhā eva–-
anya-e1201n:1232_7: tathā arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne āvassakādhamiṇatāvisiṭṭheva bhāvādo siddhā–-
anya-e1201n:1234_0: Kattari kārake kriyatthā latuṇakā bhontī; paṭhitā, pāṭhako–-
anya-e1201n:1234_3: saddho eva latuarahe sīlasādhu dhammesu ca sāmaññavihitatattā;
anya-e1201n:1237_1: Āsiṃsāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari;’jīvatuti’ jīvako;
anya-e1201n:1239_0: Karato kattari ṇano hoti;’karotī’ti kāraṇaṃ; kattarīti-kiṃ? Karaṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1241_0: Hāto vīhisiṃ kāle caṇano hotī kattari;
anya-e1201n:1243_0: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari; vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e1201n:1245_0: Vipubbā ñāiccasmā ku hoti kattari; viñña; vitoti-kiṃ? Pañño.
anya-e1201n:1247_0: Kammato parā ñāiccasmā kū hoti kattari; sabbañña, kālañña.
anya-e1201n:1249_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari;
anya-e1201n:1251_0: Kammato paraṃ gamā rū hoti kattari; vedagu, pāragu.
anya-e1201n:1253_0: Samānādīhi yādīhicopamānehi parā disā kammakārake rīrikkhakā honti;’ samāno viya dissatī’ti sadī, sadikkho, sadiso; aññādī,
anya-e1201n:1255_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aghaṇghakā honti bahakulaṃ; apaggaho, niggaho, karo, garo, cayo, jayo, ravo, bhavo, paco, vaco, annado,
anya-e1201n:1255_1: purindado, īsakkaro, dukkaro, sukaro–- ghaṇa- bhāve- pāko- vāgo, bhāvo.
anya-e1201n:1255_5: asaññāyampi- dāyo, datto; lābho, laddho–- gha-
anya-e1201n:1255_6: vakonipako–- ka- piyo, khipo, bhujo, āyudhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1257_0: Dādhāhi bahulami hotibhāvakārakesu; ādi, nidhi. Vāladhi.
anya-e1201n:1263_2: adhikaraṇaṃ, calano, jalano, kodhano, kopano, maṇḍano, bhusano.
anya-e1201n:1265_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honta no ca bahulaṃ–- a- titikkhā. Vīmaṃsā, jigucchā, pipāsā, puttīyā, īhā, bhikkhā, āpadā, medhā, godhā–- ṇa- kārā, hārā, tārā, dhārā, ārā–- kti- iṭṭhi, siṭṭhi, bhitti, bhatti, tanti, bhuti –- ka- uhā, rujā, mudā,–- yaka- vijjā, ijjā–- ya- seyyā, samajjā, pabbajjā,
anya-e1201n:1265_2: jāgariyā–- ana- kāraṇā, hāraṇā, vedanā, vandanā, upāsanā.
anya-e1201n:1267_0: Jāhā iccetehi ni hotitthiyaṃ; jāni, hāni.
anya-e1201n:1269_0: Karato ririyo hotitthiyaṃ;’karaṇaṃ’ kiriyā–-kathaṃ kriyāti?’Kriyāya’nti nipātanā.
anya-e1201n:1271_0: Kriyatthassa sarūpe’bhidheye kriyatthā pare ikitī honti; vaci, yudhi. Pacati.–-
anya-e1201n:1273_0: Kriyatthā ṇī hoti sīlādisu patīyamānesu; uṇhabhoji, khīrapāyī, avassakārī, satatdāyī.
anya-e1201n:1277_0: Bhutatthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantuktāvī hontī kattari; vijitavā, vijitāvī;
anya-e1201n:1279_0: Bhāve kamme ca bhute kto hoti; āsitaṃ bhavatā; kato kaṭo bhavatā.
anya-e1201n:1286_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca;
anya-e1201n:1288_9: passinnoti yā ettha bhutakālatā tanra kto;
anya-e1201n:1288_13: evaṃ sīlito, rakkhito, khanto, ākuṭṭho, ruṭṭho, rusito,
anya-e1201n:1290_0: Bhavissatiatthe vattamānato krayatthā bhāve tuṃtāye tave honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ patīyamānāyaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1290_4: icchati bhottuṃ kāmeti bhottunti imināva siddhaṃpunabbidhānetvihāpi siyā icchanto karotīti–-
anya-e1201n:1290_39: tadatthāyanti kiṃ gacchissato te bhavissati bhattaṃ bhojanāya.
anya-e1201n:1292_0: Alaṃkhalusaddānaṃ paṭisedhatthānaṃpayoge tunādayo vā honti bhāve;
anya-e1201n:1294_0: Eko kattā yesaṃ vyāpārānaṃ tesuyo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā tunādayo honti bhāve;
anya-e1201n:1294_2: ekakattukānanti kiṃ bhuttasmiṃ devadatte yaññadatto vajati;
anya-e1201n:1294_6: atikkamma pabbataṃ nadīti bhudhātussa sabbattha sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate.
anya-e1201n:1294_7: Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti imināva siddhamābhikkhaññantu dibbacanāvagamyate–-
anya-e1201n:1296_0: Cattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā nto hoti kattari; tiṭṭhanto.
anya-e1201n:1298_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā māno hoti kattari; tiṭṭhamāno.
anya-e1201n:1300_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve kamme ca māno hoti; ṭhīyamānaṃ, paccamāno odano.
anya-e1201n:1302_0: Anāgatatthe vattamānato kriyanthā te ntamānā ssapubbā honti;
anya-e1201n:1304_0: Kriyatthā pare bahakulaṃ ṇvādayo honti; cāru, dāru.
anya-e1201n:1306_0: Khachasappaccayantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ paṭhamamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati; titikkhā, jigucchā, vīmaṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1308_0: Parokkhāyaṃ paṭhamamekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati; jagāma–-
anya-e1201n:1309_0: Jahāti, jahitabbaṃ, jahituṃ, daddallati, vaṅkamati–-lolupo, momuhoti ottaṃ’tadaminādi’ pāsā.
anya-e1201n:1311_0: Ādibhutā sarā paramekassaraṃ dve hoti; asisisati–-ādismāti kiṃ? Jajāgāra; sarāti kiṃ? Papāca.
anya-e1201n:1313_0: Gaṃ dvibhutaṃ na taṃ puna dvattamāpajjate; titikkhasati, jigucchisati.
anya-e1201n:1321_0: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti khachasesu;
anya-e1201n:1323_0: Dvitte pubbassa gupissa ussa i hoti khachasesu; jigucchati.
anya-e1201n:1325_0: Dvitte pubbesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti; bubhukkhati. Ciccheda.
anya-e1201n:1327_0: Dvitte pubbesaṃ kavaggahānaṃ vavaggajāhonti yathā kkamaṃ; cukopa, jahāti.
anya-e1201n:1329_0: Dvitte pubbassamānassa vī hoti, parassaca maṃ; vīmaṃsati.
anya-e1201n:1333_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ ño honti yathākkamaṃ paccaye; cetabbaṃ, netabbaṃ, sotabbaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1335_0: Lahubhutassa upantassa yuvaṇṇassa ño honti yathākkamaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1337_0: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa āhoti; kārako.
anya-e1201n:1339_0: Te ñoā kānubandhe nāgame ca na honti; cito, suto, diṭṭho, puṭṭho–-
anya-e1201n:1339_15: pīnayituṃ, pīnanaṃ, pīnituṃ, pīnayati; sunoti; sinoti; dunoti; hinoti;
anya-e1201n:1341_0: Te kvaci vā na honti kānubandhanāgamesu; mudito modito; ruditaṃ, roditaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1343_0: Kānubandhanāgamato’ññasmimpi te kvaci na honti; khipako, panudanaṃ, vadhako.
anya-e1201n:1347_0: Sare pare ñonamayavā honti; jayo, bhavo–-sareti kiṃ? Jeti; anubhoti.
anya-e1201n:1349_0: Ñonamāyāvā honti sarādoṇānubandhe; nāyayati, bhāvayati. Sayāpetvātiādisurassattaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1351_0: Ākārantassa kriyatthassa yuka hoti ṇāpito’ññasmiṃ ṇānubandhe; dāyako–-
anya-e1201n:1355_0: Rudhādīnaṃ kvaci maṃ vā hoti; rundhituṃ, rujjhituṃ–-kvacitveva? Nirodho.
anya-e1201n:1357_0: Antabyañjanassa lopo hoti kvamhi;’bhattaṃ ghasanti, gaṇhanti vāetthā’ti bhattaggaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1363_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane; brūmi. Byañjanetveva? Abravi.
anya-e1201n:1365_0: Ghānubandhe cakārajakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ kagā honti yathākkamaṃ; vākyaṃ, bhāgyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1369_0: Paṭhyādīhi parassahanassagho hoti kvimhi; paligho, paṭigho, aghaṃ-rassattaṃ nipātanā;saṅgho, ogho.
anya-e1201n:1371_0: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṃ hoti se; jighaṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1373_0: Dvitte paresaṃ jiharānaṃ giṃ hoti se; vijigiṃsā, jigiṃsā.
anya-e1201n:1375_0: Dvitte parassa dhāssa ha hoti; dahati.
anya-e1201n:1377_0: Dusassadīgho hoti ṇimhī; dūsito–-ṇimhīti kiṃ? Duṭṭho.
anya-e1201n:1379_0: Guhissa dīgho hoti sare; niguhanaṃ–-sareti kiṃ? Guyhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1381_0: Muhabahānaṃ guhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhetvānatvāvajjite; mūḷho, bāḷehā, guḷho–- neti kiṃ? Muyahati.
anya-e1201n:1383_0: Vahassौssa dīgho hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite; cūḷho.
anya-e1201n:1385_0: Dhā dhāraṇenimassa hi hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvā vajjite; nihito, nihitavā.
anya-e1201n:1387_0: Hamādīnaṃ rakārantānaṃ vāntassalopo hoti te kānubandhe tvānatvāvajjite; gato, khato, hato, mato, tato, saññato, rato, kato–- tetveca? Gamyate.
anya-e1201n:1389_0: Vacādīnaṃ vassa vā uṭa hoti kānubandhe’tve; uttā, vuttaṃ; utthaṃ, vutthaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1391_0: Vacādīnamassa u hoti kānubandhe’tve; vuttaṃ, vutthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1393_0: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe’tve; vuddho, vaddho–-
anya-e1201n:1395_0: Yajassa yassa ṭiyī hontī kānubandhe’tve; iṭṭhaṃ, siṭṭhaṃ, atvetveva? Yajitvāna, yajitvā.
anya-e1201n:1397_0: Ṭhāssi hoti kānubandhe’tve; ṭhito. Atvetveva? Ṭhatvāna, ṭhatvā.
anya-e1201n:1400_0: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe’tve; jāto. Atvetveva? Janitvā.
anya-e1201n:1402_0: Sāsassa vā sishoti kānubandhe’tve; siṭṭhaṃ, satthaṃ; sisso, sāsiyo. Atvetveva? Anusāsitvāna.
anya-e1201n:1406_0: Tumādisu vā karassā hoti; kātuṃ, kattuṃ, kātuna, kattuna; kātabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1408_0: Ñadhātussa jā hoti nakāre; jānituṃ, jānatto. Neti kiṃ? Ñāto.
anya-e1201n:1410_0: Sakaāpānaṃ kukku iccete āgamā honti ṇakāre.
anya-e1201n:1410_3: sakkuṇoti, pāpuṇoti. Ṇeti kiṃ? Sakkoti, pāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1412_0: Nismā parassa cissa cho hoti; nicchayo.
anya-e1201n:1414_0: Jarasadānamantasarā paro īma hoti vibhāsā; jīraṇā, jīrati, jīrāpeti;
anya-e1201n:1416_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhuṃ, duddaso, addasa; addā, addaṃ; addakkhi,
anya-e1201n:1418_0: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rīrikkhakesu; sarī, sadī; sarikkho, sadikkho; sariso, sadiso.
anya-e1201n:1420_0: Dahassa dassaḍo hoti vā; ḍānehā, dāho; ḍahati, dahati.
anya-e1201n:1422_0: Āparīhi parassa dahassa dassa ḷo hotanaghaṇsu; āṇāhanaṃ, pariḷāho.
anya-e1201n:1424_0: Tyādinnavajjitesu paccayesu asa bhuviccassa bhu hoti; bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1425_1: etena katthaci kassaci dhātussāppayogo’pi ñāpito hoti–-
anya-e1201n:1427_0: Aādo āādo ssaādo ca atthassa bhu hoti; babhuva, abhavā, abhavissā, bhavissati.
anya-e1201n:1429_0: Ntādīsvatthissādilopo hoti; santo, samāno, santi, santu, siyā, siyuṃ–-etesviti kiṃ? Atthi.
anya-e1201n:1431_0: Pādīhi kriyāvisesajotakehi saddehi parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho vā hoti;
anya-e1201n:1431_5: pa parā apa saṃanu ava o ni du vi adhi api ati su uabhipati pari upa ā pādi;
anya-e1201n:1433_0: Pādito parassa dāssa iyaṅi henāti kvaci; anādisitvā, samādiyati; kvacītveva? Ādāya.
anya-e1201n:1434_2: karassāti avatvā karotissāti vacanaṃ timhi ca vikaraṇuppatti ñāpetuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1436_0: Pura iccasmā nipātā parassa karassakha hoti; purakkhatvā, purekkhāro, ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1438_0: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti; purakkhatvā, purekkhāro, ettaṃ tadaminādipāṭhā.
anya-e1201n:1440_0: Nismā parassa kamassa kvaci kha hoti; nikkhamati; kvacitveva? Nikkamo.
anya-e1201n:1442_0: Ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ kriyatthānamiyaṅuvaṅi honti sare kvavi;vediyati, bruvanti;
anya-e1201n:1444_0: Ñādito’ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye; diyati; aññādissāti kiṃ? Ñāyati, tāyati.
anya-e1201n:1446_0: Tanassa ā hoti vā kye; tāyate, taññate.
anya-e1201n:1448_0: Sarantassa kriyatthassadīgho hoti kye; cīyate, sūyate. Sānantarassa tassa ṭho-.
anya-e1201n:1449_0: Sakārantato kriyatthā parassānantarassatakārassa ṭha hoti; kuṭṭho, tuṭṭhavā,
anya-e1201n:1451_1: kasassa vā ima ca; kiṭṭhaṃ, kaṭṭhaṃ–-
anya-e1201n:1455_0: Pucchādīhi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa takārassaṭha hoti; puṭṭho, bhaṭṭho, yiṭṭho–-
anya-e1201n:1457_0: Etehi parassānantarassa tassa tha hoti; satthaṃ, vutthaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1459_0: Dhakārahakārabhakārantehi kriyatthehi parassānantarassa tassa dha hoti; vuddho, duddhaṃ,laddhaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1461_0: Dahā parassānantarassa tassa ḍha hoti; daṅḍho.
anya-e1201n:1463_0: Bahā parassānantarassa tassa so hoti, bahassuma ca sasantayogena; buḍḍho.
anya-e1201n:1465_1: ḷo cāntassa; āruḷho, guḷho, vuḷho, bāḷho;
anya-e1201n:1467_0: Muhā parassānantarassa tassa ha hoti vā, ḷo cāntassa hasantiyogena; muḷho, muddho.
anya-e1201n:1468_1: Bhidādito paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassano hoti; bhinno, bhinnavā, chinno, chinnavā, channo, channavā, khinno, khinnavā, uppanno,
anya-e1201n:1468_2: uppananavā, sinno, sinnavā, sanenā, sannavā, pīno, pīnavā, sūno, sūnavā, dīno, dīnavā, ḍīno, ḍīnavā, līno, līnavā, lūno, lūnavā–-
anya-e1201n:1468_3: ktaktavantunatti kiṃ? Bhitti; chitti, bhottuṃ, chettuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1470_0: Dāto paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassa inno hoti; dinno, dinnavā.
anya-e1201n:1472_0: Kirādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassānantarassa ṇa hoti; kiṇṇo, kiṇṇavā, puṇṇo, puṇṇavā, khīṇo, khīṇavā.
anya-e1201n:1474_0: Tarādīhi paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassaraṇṇo hoti; tiṇṇo, tiṇṇavā, jiṇṇo, jiṇṇavā, ciṇṇo, ciṇṇavā.
anya-e1201n:1476_0: Bhañjādīhi paresaṃktaktavantunaṃ tassānantarassaga hoti; bhaggo, bhaggavā, laggo, laggavā, nimuggo,
anya-e1201n:1478_0: Susā paresaṃ ktaktavantunaṃ tassa kho hoti; sukkheṃ, sukkhavā.
anya-e1201n:1480_0: Pacā paresaṃ ktakkavantunaṃ tassa ko hoti; pakko, pakkavā.
anya-e1201n:1482_0: Mucā paresaṃktaktavantunaṃ tassa ko vā hoti; mukko, mutto; mukkavā, muttavā–-
anya-e1201n:1484_0: Vaḍḍhā parassaktissa tassa lopo hoti; vaḍḍhi.
anya-e1201n:1486_0: Kriyatthā parassa kvissa lopo hoti; abhibhu.
anya-e1201n:1488_0: Ṇiṇāpīnaṃ lopo hoti tesu ṇiṇāpīsu;’kārentaṃ payojayayati’kāreti, kārāpeti.
anya-e1201n:1490_0: Vikaraṇānaṃ kvaci lopo hota; udapādi, hanti.
anya-e1201n:1492_0: Kriyatthā parassa mānassa makārassa lopo hoti kvaci; karāṇo; kvacati kiṃ? Kurumāno.
anya-e1201n:1494_0: Eilāname hota kvacī; gahetvā, adenti; kvacītveva? Vapitvā.
anya-e1201n:1498_0: Tvāssa vā tuṃyānā honti samāse kvaci;
anya-e1201n:1500_0: Hanasmā parassa tvāssa racco vā hoti samāse; ahacca, ahanitvā.
anya-e1201n:1502_0: Sāsādhīhi parā karā parassa tvāssa cacariccā vā honti yathākkamaṃ; sakkacca,
anya-e1201n:1504_0: Iiccasmā parassa tvāssa cco vā hoti; adhicca, adhiyitvā, samecca, sametvā.
anya-e1201n:1508_0: Kriyatthā parassa byañjanādippaccayassa ñi vā hoti; bhuñjituṃ, hottu; byañjanassāti kiṃ? Pācako.
anya-e1201n:1510_0: Rāntato kriyatthā parassa paccayanakārassa ṇo hoti; araṇaṃ, saraṇaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1512_0: Rāntato paresaṃ ntamānatyādīnaṃ nassa ṇo na hoti; karonto, kurumāno; karonti.
anya-e1201n:1516_0: Etesamīyaṅi vā hoti ntamānatyādisu; jīyanto, jīranto; jīyamāno, jīramāno; jīyati, jīrati; mīyanto, maranto; mīyamāno, maramāno; mīyati, marati.
anya-e1201n:1518_2: tiṭṭhamāno, tiṭṭhati; pivanto, pivati; vātveva? Ṭhāti, pāti.
anya-e1201n:1522_0: Karassa saokārassa kubbādayo vā honti ntamānatyādisu; kubbanto,
anya-e1201n:1522_3: kayiramāno, karāṇo; kubbati, kayirati, karoti; kubbate, kurute,
anya-e1201n:1524_0: Gahassa vā gheppoti ntamānatyādisu; gheppanto, gheppamāno, gheppati–-vātveva? Gaṇhāti.
anya-e1201n:1526_0: Gahassa niggahatassa ṇo hoti; gaṇhitabbaṃ, gaṇhituṃ, gaṇhanto.
anya-e1201n:1527_0: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ khādikaṇḍo pañcamo.
anya-e1201n:1529_0: Vattamānñāraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo hontī; gacchati,
anya-e1201n:1529_13: bhavanteva hi kālantare’pi tyādayo bāhulakā?“Santesu pariguhāmi mā ca kiñci ito adaṃ,
anya-e1201n:1529_14: kāyayassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ sahavyataṃ gacchati vāsavassa,
anya-e1201n:1531_0: Bhavissati anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti;
anya-e1201n:1533_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṃ vimbhaye ca gamyamānessatyādayo honti;
anya-e1201n:1533_2: na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassapāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati;
anya-e1201n:1533_3: kathañhi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karissati;
anya-e1201n:1533_4: tattha nāma tvaṃ moghapurisamayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya vetessasi,
anya-e1201n:1533_5: atthi nāmatāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi,
anya-e1201n:1533_8: Acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhūtaṃ vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārenaviranti,
anya-e1201n:1533_9: yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattānī sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva dakkhiti,
anya-e1201n:1535_0: Bhute parisamattñatthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti; agamī, agamuṃ, agamo,
anya-e1201n:1535_1: agamittha, agamiṃ, agamimhā; agamā, agamū, agamise,
anya-e1201n:1537_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhute’tthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti.
anya-e1201n:1538_0: Āñāyyā ca uṭṭhānā āñāyyā ca saṃvesanā,
anya-e1201n:1542_0: Apaccakkhe bhutānajjatane’tthe cattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti; jagāma, jagamu, jagame,
anya-e1201n:1543_0: Mūḷhavikkhittabyāsattacittonattanāpi kriyā katābhinibbattikāle’nupaladdhā samānā elenānumīyamānā parokkhāca vatthuto;
anya-e1201n:1545_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo honti vibhāsā;
anya-e1201n:1545_1: vidhurappaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato vā kriyāyāti patanamanipphatti kriyātipatti;
anya-e1201n:1548_0: Hetubhutāyaṃ phalabhutāyañca kriyāyaṃ vattamānato kriyatthāeyyādayo vā honti.
anya-e1201n:1549_22: Itisaddeneva hetuhetumantatāyaya jotitattā vāti kiṃ dakkhiṇena ce gamissati,
anya-e1201n:1552_0: Etesu pañhādisu kriyatthato eyyādayo honti; pañhe?-
anya-e1201n:1552_20: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya;
anya-e1201n:1556_0: Sattiyaṃ arahatthe ca kriyatthā. Eyyādayo honti; bhavaṃ khalu rajjaṃ kareyya, bhavaṃ satto; arabho.
anya-e1201n:1558_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayohonti vibhāsā;
anya-e1201n:1558_3: Asaniyāpi hato nāpatissā sambhāvemi saddahāmiavakappemi bhuñjeyya bhavaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1560_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti;
anya-e1201n:1560_2: mā bhavaṃ agamā vanaṃ; vāti kiṃ?
anya-e1201n:1560_11: lunassu lunassutvevāyaṃ lunātīti tvādīnamevetaṃ majjhimapuri sekavacanānamābhikkhaññe vibbavanaṃ;
anya-e1201n:1560_13: Evamesa turito aññe’pi niyojento viya kiriyaṃ karotīti;
anya-e1201n:1560_16: tathā kālattaresupi lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṃ aluni, alunā, lulāva,
anya-e1201n:1560_23: byāpārabhede tu sāmaññavacanasseva byāpakattā anuppayogo bhavati?
anya-e1201n:1562_0: Ekanekesutumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesupubbacchakkānaṃ paracchakkānaṃ majjhimuttamapaṭhamā
anya-e1201n:1563_0: Sāmatthiyā laddhantā appaṭhujjamānesupi tumhāmhasesesu bhavanti–- gacchasī,
anya-e1201n:1565_0: Āādo īādo ssāādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hoti,
anya-e1201n:1565_1: ñakāro’nubandho–- agamā, gamā; agamī, gamī; agamissā, gamissā.
anya-e1201n:1566_0: Aādisvāho brūssa-. Brūssa āho hoti aādisu; āha, āhu.
anya-e1201n:1568_0: Aādisu bhussa cuka hoti; kakāro’nubandho; ukāro uccāraṇattho; babhuva.
anya-e1201n:1570_0: Aādisu dvitte pubbassa bhussaa hoti; babhuva.
anya-e1201n:1574_2: Atoyeva ca ñāpakā tiantisu ca brūssāho.
anya-e1201n:1576_0: Īādisuvacassa oma hoti; makāro’nubandhā; avoca; īādoti kiṃ? Avaca.
anya-e1201n:1578_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṃ vā hoti mimesu;
anya-e1201n:1580_0: Karassa saokārassa kuṃ vā hoti mimesu; kummi, kumma; karomi, karoma.
anya-e1201n:1582_0: Karassa saokārassakā hoti vā īādisu; akāsi, akari; akaṃsu, akariṃsu; akā, akarā.
anya-e1201n:1584_0: Karassasossahāssaca āhaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; kāhati,
anya-e1201n:1586_0: Labhādīnaṃ cchaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; alacchā,
anya-e1201n:1588_0: Bhujādīnaṃ kkhaṅi vā hoti ssena saha; abhokkhā,
anya-e1201n:1588_10: Visassāññasmimpi vā kkhaṅi yogavibhāgā?- Pāvekkhi, pāvisi.
anya-e1201n:1590_0: Āādoīādo ca harassaā hoticā; ahā, aharā; abhāsi, abhari.
anya-e1201n:1592_0: Āādoīādo ca gamissā hoti vā; agā, agamā; agā,agami. Saṃsassa ca chaṅi-.
anya-e1201n:1593_0: Saṃsassa ca gamissa ca chaṅi vā hoti āīādisu; aḍañchā, aḍaṃsā;
anya-e1201n:1595_0: Hūssa hñādayo honti ssaccādo; hessati, hehissati, hohissati.
anya-e1201n:1599_0: Esaṃ vā rasso hoti; gama, gamā; gami, gamī; gamu; gamimha, gamimhā; gamissa, gamissā;
anya-e1201n:1601_0: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti; akkocchi, akkosi; abhirucchi, abhiruhi.
anya-e1201n:1603_0: Kriyatthā paresaṃ aādīnaṃ īādinaṃ ssaādīnava byañjanassैña hoti vibhāsā;
anya-e1201n:1605_0: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti; bravīti, brūti.
anya-e1201n:1607_0: Kriyatthā parassakyassa īñvā hoti; pacīyati paccati.
anya-e1201n:1611_0: Umiccassa iṃsuaṃsu vā honti; agamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, agamuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1613_0: Ñādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṃ vā hoti; nesuṃ, nayiṃsu; assosuṃ, assuṃ–-
anya-e1201n:1615_0: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṃ vā hoti; ahesuṃ, ahavuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1617_0: Ossa aādayo vā honti; tvaṃ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho, abhavo.
anya-e1201n:1619_0: Ossa si vā hoti; ahosi tvaṃ ahuvo.
anya-e1201n:1621_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti; akāsi, akā; adāsi, adā.
anya-e1201n:1623_0: Mhātthānamuñdvā hoti; agamumhā, agamimhā; agamuttha, agamittha.
anya-e1201n:1625_0: Imiccassa siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ; akāsiṃ, akariṃ;
anya-e1201n:1627_0: Eyyumiccassa uṃ vā hoti; gacchuṃ, gaccheyyuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1629_0: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti; gaccha, gacchāhi–-atoti kiṃ? Karohi.
anya-e1201n:1631_0: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse; andhabhavissā, anvabhuyissā, anubhavissati, anubhuyissati.
anya-e1201n:1633_1: bhuvīccasmā paresaṃeyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ; assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṃ, assāma.
anya-e1201n:1635_0: Atthiteyyādicchannaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ iyāisuṃ honti yathākkamaṃ; siyā, siyuṃ.
anya-e1201n:1637_0: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti; attha, atthu.
anya-e1201n:1639_0: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu; ṭo sabbādesattho; asi, ahi.
anya-e1201n:1641_0: Atthismā paresaṃ mimānaṃ mhimhā vā honti, taṃsantiyo gena tthissa aṭa ca; amhi,asmi; amha, asma.
anya-e1201n:1643_0: Esu mimesuatthissa sakāro hoti; asmi, asma; pararūpabādhanatthaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1645_0: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi; āsi, āsuṃ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṃ, āsimhā.
anya-e1201n:1646_0: Himimesvassa-. Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu; pavāhi, pavāmi, pavāma; muyhāmi.
anya-e1201n:1648_0: Sakasmā kaṇāssa kho hoti ī ādisu; asakkhi, asakkhiṃsu.
anya-e1201n:1650_0: Sakasmā kaṇāssa kho vā bhoti sse; sakkhissā, sakkuṇissā; sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
anya-e1201n:1652_0: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṃ keṇākaṇānaṃ roṭa hoti; assosi, asuṇi; assossā, asuṇissā; sossati,
anya-e1201n:1654_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi; nāyati. Jānāti.
anya-e1201n:1656_0: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ vā hoti; jaññā, jāneyya.
anya-e1201n:1658_0: Ñāto eyyassa iyāñā honti vā; jāniyā, jaññā, jāneyya.
anya-e1201n:1660_0: Īādo ssaccādo ca ñāto kanā lopo vā hoti; aññasi, ajāni; ñassati, jānissati.
anya-e1201n:1662_0: Ñāto parassassassa hi vā hoti kamme; paññāyihiti, paññāyissatī,
anya-e1201n:1664_0: Etismā parassassassahi hoti vā; ehiti, essati.
anya-e1201n:1666_0: Hanā ssassa chekhā vā honti; hañchema, hanissāma; paṭihaṃkhāmi, paṭihanissāmi.
anya-e1201n:1668_0: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā; hāhati, chahissati.
anya-e1201n:1670_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassassassa lopo vā hoti; dakkhati.
anya-e1201n:1672_0: Kayirā parasseyyumādīnameyyassa lopo hoti; kayiruṃ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e1201n:1678_0: Labhasmā iṃīiccesaṃ thaṃthā honti vā; alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ; alattha, alabhi.
anya-e1201n:1680_0: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṃ ntentīnaṃ re vā hoti; gacchare,
anya-e1201n:1682_0: Eyyādīnaṃ ṭe vā hoti; so kare, so kareyya; tvaṃ, kare, tvaṃ kareyyāsi; ahaṃ kare, ahaṃ kareyyaṃ.
anya-e1201n:1686_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke; vanuti, vanoti.
anya-e1201n:1688_0: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti, u ca; bhavemu, bhaveyyāmu, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e1201n:1689_0: Iti moggallāne vyākaraṇe vuttiyaṃ tyādikaṇḍo chaṭṭho.
